=================
atsphinx-goto-top
=================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :hidden:

   demo
   guide
   override
   changes

Overview
========

This is Sphinx-exntension to add "Back to top" button into every themes.
Provided button is generic, user can customize with almost no limits.

Prese see :doc:`demo` to experience it.

Concept
=======

This extension is made for working on any themes.
Therefore, this is implemented simple and users can override contents easy.
